1.0.name: wordpress/bp-paginated-posts
1.0.description: If you're using BuddyPress and displaying site wide posts, this plugin is a necessary replacement for the one that comes packaged with BuddyPress. The widget options include title, posts per page, total posts, number of posts with excerpt, and previous and next link titles.
